UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user of the application, storing their profile information, role, and settings.

uid.description: The unique identifier for the user, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

name.description: The user's full name or display name.

avatarUrl.description: URL to the user's profile picture.

role.description: The role of the user within the application.

prefersReducedMotion.description: Indicates if the user prefers reduced motion.

highContrastMode.description: Indicates if the user prefers a high-contrast theme.

Content.title: Content
Content.description: Represents a piece of educational content, like a course or a lesson.

description.description: A detailed description of the content.

category.description: The category the content belongs to (e.g., 'Development', 'Design').

thumbnailUrl.description: URL for the content's thumbnail image.

teacherId.description: The UID of the user who created this content.

Session.title: Session
Session.description: Represents a scheduled meeting or live session.

meetingUrl.description: The URL for the virtual meeting (e.g., Google Meet, Zoom).

startTime.description: The scheduled start time of the session.

endTime.description: The scheduled end time of the session.

participants.description: An array of user UIDs participating in the session.

Payment.title: Payment
Payment.description: Represents a payment transaction for content or services.

userId.description: The UID of the user who made the payment.

contentId.description: The ID of the content being purchased.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the payment was created.

Sponsorship.title: Sponsorship
Sponsorship.description: Represents a sponsorship of a student by a sponsor.

sponsorId.description: The UID of the sponsoring user.

studentId.description: The UID of the sponsored student.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the sponsorship was made.

ForumThread.title: Forum Thread
ForumThread.description: Represents a thread in the discussion forum.

title.description: The title of the forum thread.

authorId.description: The UID of the user who started the thread.

contentId.description: The ID of the content this thread is related to.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the thread was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores the public profile for each user.

/content/{contentId}.description: Collection of all educational content available on the platform.

/content/{contentId}/sessions/{sessionId.description: Sub-collection for live sessions related to a specific piece of content.

/users/{userId}/payments/{paymentId}.description: Sub-collection for a user's payment history.

/forumThreads/{threadId}.description: Collection of all main forum threads.
